Text: Brilliant work guys!  Can you post a link to your other releases on TPB?
Also, thanks for keeping DTS-MA...I really look forward to more releases with lossless audio. The popcorn hours supports bitstreaming of this codec, so it is superb that your release has DTS-MA.
Thank You for the up! Just 1 question: does this have menu and/or special features??

Thank you!

Notes

This contains the most popular bonus features found with Monsters, Inc.: Outtakes and company play video, Mike's New Car, and For The Birds.

There are more subtitle tracks than you will ever need--easy to demux and also helpful if you speak Spanish. 

Audio tracks contain 2ch Director commentary, DTS 5.1, and AC3 5.1 Spanish.

If you demux the other languages and remove bonus features, the main movie comes out to only 6.09GB.

Hey! Thanks for all this DUAL audio movies. Keep up the good work and I will be seeding for a long time!
Hope to see more movies!
Guys don't up RARs, there's no way to preview, no way to see what's actually in the torrent.  Not cool...
